name: Rock You
description:
Rock You

A competitive rock throwing shooter. Out-pain your foes to gain the first place!

This is meant to played online with a few players (5-10). Stay posted on Discord for scheduled online tournaments!

This was complete during the CoCoJam hosted by Concordia and ETS. I participated alone, therefore I took some shortcuts (have a look at the sources).

Note, web version does not have a fixed region therefore you might not be able to connect with people. I recommend the Windows build!

Controls

WASD to move.

Mouse to turn.

Scroll to zoom.

Left click to throw rocks.

E  to use emotes.

Sources

- Character/Animations: https://www.mixamo.com/

- Low Poly Environment: 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/rpg-poly-pack-l...

- Networking: https://doc.photonengine.com/en-us/pun/current/getting-started/pun-intro

- Theme song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lqryVXRhr68&ab_channel=AntonShilo
